fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select two players. Subtract the first player's role number from the second player. The second player is converted into whichever role their new number becomes. Their goal and alignment will remain the same though.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you subtract someone into a negative number, you will die and lose the game. They will be unaffected by your ability in this case.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Subtract three people's role numbers, but don't subtract someone into a negative number.
